 6297: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6298: 
 6299: sc_lc_receive_response_tcp(InitState) ->
 6300:     %% This (acceptor) is the server that accepts connections.
 6301:     %% But it is also suppose to close the connection socket, 
 6302:     %% and trigger the read failure (=closed) for the handler process.
 6303:     AcceptorSeq =
 6304:         [
 6305:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6306:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6307:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6308:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6309:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6310:                    end},
 6311:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6312:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6313:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6314:                            ok
 6315:                    end},
 6316: 
 6317:          %% *** Init part ***
 6318:          #{desc => "which local address",
 6319:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6320:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6321:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 6322:                    end},
 6323:          #{desc => "create (listen) socket",
 6324:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 6325:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 6326:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 6327:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6328:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 6329:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6330:                                    ERROR
 6331:                            end
 6332:                    end},
 6333:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 6334:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6335:                          lsock  := LSock,
 6336:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
 6337:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("bind to LSA: "
 6338:                                        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
 6339:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 6340:                                ok ->
 6341:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
 6342:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6343:                                    ERROR
 6344:                            end;
 6345:                       (#{lsock := LSock,
 6346:                          lsa   := LSA} = State) ->
 6347:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 6348:                                ok ->
 6349:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 6350:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 6351:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 6352:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6353:                                    ERROR
 6354:                            end
 6355:                    end},
 6356:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 6357:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 6358:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 6359:                    end},
 6360:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6361:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6362:                          tester := Tester,
 6363:                          lsa    := #{path := Path}}) ->
 6364:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
 6365:                            ok;
 6366:                       (#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 6367:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 6368:                            ok
 6369:                    end},
 6370:                            
 6371:          %% The actual test
 6372:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 6373:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6374:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept) of
 6375:                                {ok, {H1, H2, H3}} ->
 6376:                                    {ok, State#{handler1 => H1,
 6377:                                                handler2 => H2,
 6378:                                                handler3 => H3}};
 6379:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6380:                                    ERROR
 6381:                            end
 6382:                    end},
 6383:          #{desc => "await accept",
 6384:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 6385:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 6386:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6387:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("connection accepted: "
 6388:                                                "~n   ~p", [socket:sockname(Sock)]),
 6389:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 6390:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6391:                                    ERROR
 6392:                            end
 6393:                    end},
 6394:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 6395:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6396:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 6397:                            ok
 6398:                    end},
 6399:          #{desc => "transfer connection to handler 1",
 6400:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Handler, csock := Sock}) ->
 6401:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, transfer, Sock),
 6402:                            ok
 6403:                    end},
 6404:          #{desc => "transfer connection to handler 2",
 6405:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Handler, csock := Sock}) ->
 6406:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, transfer, Sock),
 6407:                            ok
 6408:                    end},
 6409:          #{desc => "transfer connection to handler 3",
 6410:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Handler, csock := Sock}) ->
 6411:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, transfer, Sock),
 6412:                            ok
 6413:                    end},
 6414:          #{desc => "await continue (close)",
 6415:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6416:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close),
 6417:                            ok
 6418:                    end},
 6419:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 6420:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 6421:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 6422:                                ok ->
 6423:                                    {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)};
 6424:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6425:                                    ERROR
 6426:                            end
 6427:                    end},
 6428:          #{desc => "announce ready (close)",
 6429:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6430:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, close),
 6431:                            ok
 6432:                    end},
 6433: 
 6434:          %% *** Terminate ***
 6435:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 6436:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6437:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6438:                                ok ->
 6439:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6440:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6441:                                    ERROR
 6442:                            end
 6443:                    end},
 6444:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 6445:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6446:                          lsock  := Sock,
 6447:                          lsa    := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 6448:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 6449:                            State1 =
 6450:                                unlink_path(Path,
 6451:                                            fun() ->maps:remove(lsa, State) end,
 6452:                                            fun() -> State end),
 6453:                            State2 = maps:remove(lsock, State1),
 6454:                            State3 = maps:remove(lport, State2),
 6455:                            {ok, State3};
 6456:                       (#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
 6457:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 6458:                                ok ->
 6459:                                    State1 = maps:remove(lsock, State),
 6460:                                    State2 = maps:remove(lport, State1),
 6461:                                    {ok, State2};
 6462:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6463:                                    ERROR
 6464:                            end
 6465:                    end},
 6466: 
 6467:          %% *** We are done ***
 6468:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6469:         ],
 6470: 
 6471:     %% The point of this is to perform the recv for which
 6472:     %% we are testing the response.
 6473:     HandlerSeq =
 6474:         [
 6475:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6476:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6477:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6478:                            {Tester, Acceptor} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6479:                            {ok, State#{tester  => Tester, 
 6480:                                       acceptor => Acceptor}}
 6481:                    end},
 6482:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6483:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6484:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6485:                            ok
 6486:                    end},
 6487:          #{desc => "monitor acceptor",
 6488:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Acceptor} = _State) ->
 6489:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Acceptor),
 6490:                            ok
 6491:                    end},
 6492:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6493:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6494:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 6495:                            ok
 6496:                    end},
 6497: 
 6498:          %% The actual test
 6499:          #{desc => "await continue (transfer)",
 6500:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
 6501:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Pid, acceptor, transfer) of
 6502:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6503:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6504:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6505:                                    ERROR
 6506:                            end
 6507:                    end},
 6508:          #{desc => "announce ready (transfer)",
 6509:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6510:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, transfer),
 6511:                            ok
 6512:                    end},
 6513:          #{desc => "attempt recv (=> closed)",
 6514:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv} = State) ->
 6515:                            %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6516:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 6517:                                {ok, _Data} ->
 6518:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected data received"),
 6519:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
 6520:                                {error, closed} ->
 6521:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected 'closed' "
 6522:                                                "result"),
 6523:                                    State1 = maps:remove(sock, State),
 6524:                                    {ok, State1};
 6525:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 6526:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected read failure: "
 6527:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6528:                                    ERROR
 6529:                            end
 6530:                    end},
 6531:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv closed)",
 6532:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6533:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_closed),
 6534:                            ok
 6535:                    end},
 6536: 
 6537:          %% *** Terminate ***
 6538:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 6539:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6540:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6541:                                ok ->
 6542:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6543:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6544:                                    ERROR
 6545:                            end
 6546:                    end},
 6547: 
 6548: 
 6549:          %% *** We are done ***
 6550:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6551:         ],
 6552: 
 6553:     %% The point of this is basically just to create the connection.
 6554:     ClientSeq =
 6555:         [
 6556:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6557:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6558:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6559:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6560:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6561:                    end},
 6562:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6563:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6564:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6565:                            ok
 6566:                    end},
 6567: 
 6568:          %% *** Init part ***
 6569:          #{desc => "which local address",
 6570:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6571:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6572:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 6573:                    end},
 6574:          #{desc => "create socket",
 6575:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 6576:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 6577:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 6578:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6579:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6580:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6581:                                    ERROR
 6582:                            end
 6583:                    end},
 6584:          #{desc => "bind socket to local address",
 6585:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 6586:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("bind to LSA: "
 6587:                                        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
 6588:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6589:                                ok ->
 6590:                                    ok;
 6591:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6592:                                    ERROR
 6593:                            end
 6594:                    end},
 6595:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6596:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6597:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 6598:                            ok
 6599:                    end},
 6600: 
 6601:          %% The actual test
 6602:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 6603:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local = Domain,
 6604:                          tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6605:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect) of
 6606:                                {ok, ServerPath} ->
 6607:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Server Path: "
 6608:                                                "~n   ~s", [ServerPath]),
 6609:                                    ServerSA = #{family => Domain,
 6610:                                                 path   => ServerPath},
 6611:                                    {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}};
 6612:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6613:                                    ERROR
 6614:                            end;
 6615:                       (#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 6616:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect) of
 6617:                                {ok, Port} ->
 6618:                                    ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 6619:                                    {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}};
 6620:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6621:                                    ERROR
 6622:                            end
 6623:                    end},
 6624:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 6625:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := ServerSA}) ->
 6626:                            socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA)
 6627:                    end},
 6628:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 6629:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6630:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 6631:                            ok
 6632:                    end},
 6633: 
 6634:          %% *** Terminate ***
 6635:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 6636:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6637:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6638:                                ok ->
 6639:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6640:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6641:                                    ERROR
 6642:                            end                           
 6643:                    end},
 6644:          #{desc => "close socket",
 6645:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 6646:                          sock     := Sock,
 6647:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 6648:                            sock_close(Sock),
 6649:                            State1 =
 6650:                                unlink_path(Path,
 6651:                                            fun() ->
 6652:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 6653:                                            end,
 6654:                                            fun() -> State end),
 6655:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
 6656:                        (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 6657:                            sock_close(Sock),
 6658:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 6659:                    end},
 6660: 
 6661:          %% *** We are done ***
 6662:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6663:         ],
 6664: 
 6665:     TesterSeq =
 6666:         [
 6667:          %% *** Init part ***
 6668:          #{desc => "monitor acceptor",
 6669:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6670:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6671:                            ok
 6672:                    end},
 6673:          #{desc => "monitor handler 1",
 6674:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6675:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6676:                            ok
 6677:                    end},
 6678:          #{desc => "monitor handler 2",
 6679:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6680:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6681:                            ok
 6682:                    end},
 6683:          #{desc => "monitor handler 3",
 6684:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6685:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6686:                            ok
 6687:                    end},
 6688:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 6689:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6690:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6691:                            ok
 6692:                    end},
 6693: 
 6694:          %% Start the acceptor
 6695:          #{desc => "order acceptor start",
 6696:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6697:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 6698:                            ok
 6699:                    end},
 6700:          #{desc => "await acceptor ready (init)",
 6701:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
 6702:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, acceptor, init) of
 6703:                                {ok, PortOrPath} ->
 6704:                                    {ok, State#{server_info => PortOrPath}};
 6705:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6706:                                    ERROR
 6707:                            end
 6708:                    end},
 6709: 
 6710:          %% Start the handler(s)
 6711:          #{desc => "order handler 1 start",
 6712:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Acceptor, handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6713:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Acceptor),
 6714:                            ok
 6715:                    end},
 6716:          #{desc => "await handler 1 ready (init)",
 6717:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6718:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler1, init)
 6719:                    end},
 6720:          #{desc => "order handler 2 start",
 6721:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Acceptor, handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6722:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Acceptor),
 6723:                            ok
 6724:                    end},
 6725:          #{desc => "await handler 2 ready (init)",
 6726:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6727:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler2, init)
 6728:                    end},
 6729:          #{desc => "order handler 3 start",
 6730:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Acceptor, handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6731:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Acceptor),
 6732:                            ok
 6733:                    end},
 6734:          #{desc => "await handler 3 ready (init)",
 6735:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6736:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler3, init)
 6737:                    end},
 6738: 
 6739:          %% Start the client
 6740:          #{desc => "order client start",
 6741:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6742:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 6743:                            ok
 6744:                    end},
 6745:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 6746:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6747:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 6748:                    end},
 6749: 
 6750:          %% The actual test
 6751:          #{desc => "order acceptor to continue (accept)",
 6752:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid, 
 6753:                          handler1 := H1, 
 6754:                          handler2 := H2, 
 6755:                          handler3 := H3} = _State) ->
 6756:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept, {H1, H2, H3}),
 6757:                            ok
 6758:                    end},
 6759:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6760:          #{desc => "order client to continue (connect)",
 6761:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_info := Info} = _State) ->
 6762:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect, Info),
 6763:                            ok
 6764:                    end},
 6765:          #{desc => "await acceptor ready (accept)",
 6766:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6767:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, acceptor, accept)
 6768:                    end},
 6769:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 6770:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6771:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, connect)
 6772:                    end},
 6773:          #{desc => "await handler 1 ready (transfer)",
 6774:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6775:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler1, transfer)
 6776:                    end},
 6777:          #{desc => "await handler 2 ready (transfer)",
 6778:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6779:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler2, transfer)
 6780:                    end},
 6781:          #{desc => "await handler 3 ready (transfer)",
 6782:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6783:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler3, transfer)
 6784:                    end},
 6785:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6786:          #{desc => "order acceptor to continue (close connection socket)",
 6787:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6788:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close),
 6789:                            ok
 6790:                    end},
 6791:          #{desc => "await acceptor ready (close)",
 6792:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6793:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, acceptor, close)
 6794:                    end},
 6795:          #{desc => "await handler 1 ready (recv closed)",
 6796:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6797:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler1, recv_closed)
 6798:                    end},
 6799:          #{desc => "await handler 2 ready (recv closed)",
 6800:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6801:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler2, recv_closed)
 6802:                    end},
 6803:          #{desc => "await handler 3 ready (recv closed)",
 6804:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6805:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler3, recv_closed)
 6806:                    end},
 6807: 
 6808:          %% Terminations
 6809:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 6810:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6811:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6812:                            ok
 6813:                    end},
 6814:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 6815:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 6816:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6817:                                ok ->
 6818:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client, State)};
 6819:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6820:                                    ERROR
 6821:                            end
 6822:                    end},
 6823:          #{desc => "order handler 1 to terminate",
 6824:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6825:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6826:                            ok
 6827:                    end},
 6828:          #{desc => "await handler 1 termination",
 6829:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = State) ->
 6830:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6831:                                ok ->
 6832:                                    {ok, maps:remove(handler1, State)};
 6833:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6834:                                    ERROR
 6835:                            end
 6836:                    end},
 6837:          #{desc => "order handler 2 to terminate",
 6838:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6839:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6840:                            ok
 6841:                    end},
 6842:          #{desc => "await handler 2 termination",
 6843:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = State) ->
 6844:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6845:                                ok ->
 6846:                                    {ok, maps:remove(handler2, State)};
 6847:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6848:                                    ERROR
 6849:                            end
 6850:                    end},
 6851:          #{desc => "order handler 3 to terminate",
 6852:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6853:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6854:                            ok
 6855:                    end},
 6856:          #{desc => "await handler 3 termination",
 6857:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = State) ->
 6858:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6859:                                ok ->
 6860:                                    {ok, maps:remove(handler3, State)};
 6861:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6862:                                    ERROR
 6863:                            end
 6864:                    end},
 6865:          #{desc => "order acceptor to terminate",
 6866:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6867:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6868:                            ok
 6869:                    end},
 6870:          #{desc => "await acceptor termination",
 6871:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
 6872:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6873:                                ok ->
 6874:                                    {ok, maps:remove(acceptor, State)};
 6875:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6876:                                    ERROR
 6877:                            end
 6878:                    end},
 6879: 
 6880: 
 6881:          %% *** We are done ***
 6882:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6883:         ],
 6884: 
 6885:     i("start acceptor evaluator"),
 6886:     AccInitState = InitState,
 6887:     Acceptor = ?SEV_START("acceptor", AcceptorSeq, AccInitState),
 6888: 
 6889:     i("start handler 1 evaluator"),
 6890:     HandlerInitState = #{recv => maps:get(recv, InitState)},
 6891:     Handler1 = ?SEV_START("handler-1", HandlerSeq, HandlerInitState),
 6892: 
 6893:     i("start handler 2 evaluator"),
 6894:     Handler2 = ?SEV_START("handler-2", HandlerSeq, HandlerInitState),
 6895: 
 6896:     i("start handler 3 evaluator"),
 6897:     Handler3 = ?SEV_START("handler-3", HandlerSeq, HandlerInitState),
 6898: 
 6899:     i("start client evaluator"),
 6900:     ClientInitState = InitState,
 6901:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 6902: 
 6903:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 6904:     TesterInitState = #{acceptor => Acceptor#ev.pid,
 6905:                         handler1 => Handler1#ev.pid,
 6906:                         handler2 => Handler2#ev.pid,
 6907:                         handler3 => Handler3#ev.pid,
 6908:                         client   => Client#ev.pid},
 6909:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 6910: 
 6911:     i("await evaluator"),
 6912:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Acceptor, 
 6913:                             Handler1, Handler2, Handler3, 
 6914:                             Client, Tester]).
 6915:

 6917: 
 6918: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6919: %% This test case is intended to test what happens when a socket is 
 6920: %% locally closed while a process is calling the recvfrom function.
 6921: %% Socket is IPv4.
 6922: %% 
 6923: 
 6924: sc_lc_recvfrom_response_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6925:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
 6926:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 6927:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6928:            fun() ->
 6929:                    Recv      = fun(Sock, To) ->
 6930:                                        socket:recvfrom(Sock, [], To)
 6931:                                end,
 6932:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6933:                                  protocol => udp,
 6934:                                  recv     => Recv},
 6935:                    ok = sc_lc_receive_response_udp(InitState)
 6936:            end).
 6937: 
 6938: 
 6939: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6940: %% This test case is intended to test what happens when a socket is 
 6941: %% locally closed while the process is calling the recv function.
 6942: %% Socket is IPv6.
 6943: 
 6944: sc_lc_recvfrom_response_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6945:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
 6946:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 6947:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6948:            fun() ->
 6949:                    Recv      = fun(Sock, To) ->
 6950:                                        socket:recvfrom(Sock, [], To)
 6951:                                end,
 6952:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 6953:                                  protocol => udp,
 6954:                                  recv     => Recv},
 6955:                    ok = sc_lc_receive_response_udp(InitState)
 6956:            end).
 6957: 
 6958: 
 6959: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6960: %% This test case is intended to test what happens when a socket is 
 6961: %% locally closed while the process is calling the recv function.
 6962: %% Socket is Unix Domainm (dgram) socket.
 6963: 
 6964: sc_lc_recvfrom_response_udpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6965:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
 6966:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 6967:            fun() ->
 6968: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 6969: 		   is_not_windows()
 6970: 	   end,
 6971:            fun() ->
 6972:                    Recv      = fun(Sock, To) ->
 6973:                                        socket:recvfrom(Sock, [], To)
 6974:                                end,
 6975:                    InitState = #{domain   => local,
 6976:                                  protocol => default,
 6977:                                  recv     => Recv},
 6978:                    ok = sc_lc_receive_response_udp(InitState)
 6979:            end).
 6980: 
 6981: 
 6982: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6983: 
 6984: sc_lc_receive_response_udp(InitState) ->
 6985:     PrimServerSeq =
 6986:         [
 6987:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6988:          #{desc => "await start",
 6989:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6990:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6991:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6992:                    end},
 6993:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6994:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6995:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6996:                            ok
 6997:                    end},
 6998: 
 6999:          %% *** Init part ***
 7000:          #{desc => "local address",
 7001:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 7002:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 7003:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 7004:                    end},
 7005:          #{desc => "open socket",
 7006:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 7007:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, dgram, Proto),
 7008:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
 7009:                    end},
 7010:          #{desc => "bind socket",
 7011:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA}) ->
 7012:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 7013:                                ok ->
 7014:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound"),
 7015:                                    ok;
 7016:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 7017:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
 7018:                                    ERROR
 7019:                            end
 7020:                    end},
 7021:          #{desc => "socket name",
 7022:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 7023:                            case socket:sockname(Sock) of
 7024:                                {ok, SA} ->
 7025:                                    {ok, State#{sa => SA}};
 7026:                                {error, eafnosupport = Reason} ->
 7027:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed get socket name: "
 7028:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 7029:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
 7030:                                    {skip, Reason};
 7031:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 7032:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed get socket name: "
 7033:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 7034:                                    ERROR
 7035:                            end
 7036:                    end},
 7037:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 7038:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock}) ->
 7039:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
 7040:                            ok
 7041:                    end},
 7042: 
 7043:          %% The actual test
 7044:          #{desc => "await continue (recv, with timeout)",
 7045:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7046:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv) of
 7047:                                {ok, Timeout} ->
 7048:                                    {ok, State#{timeout => Timeout}};
 7049:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7050:                                    ERROR
 7051:                            end
 7052:                    end},
 7053:          #{desc => "receive, with timeout",
 7054:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv, timeout := Timeout}) ->
 7055:                            case Recv(Sock, Timeout) of
 7056:                                {error, timeout} ->
 7057:                                    ok;
 7058:                                {ok, _} ->
 7059:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
 7060:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7061:                                    ERROR
 7062:                            end
 7063:                    end},
 7064:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv, with timeout)",
 7065:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7066:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
 7067:                            ok
 7068:                    end},
 7069:          #{desc => "await continue (close)",
 7070:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7071:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close)
 7072:                    end},
 7073:          #{desc => "close socket",
 7074:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 7075:                          sock     := Sock,
 7076:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 7077:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 7078:                            State1 =
 7079:                                unlink_path(Path,
 7080:                                            fun() ->
 7081:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 7082:                                            end,
 7083:                                            fun() -> State end),
 7084:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
 7085:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 7086:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 7087:                                ok ->
 7088:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)};
 7089:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7090:                                    ERROR
 7091:                            end
 7092:                    end},
 7093:          #{desc => "announce ready (close)",
 7094:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7095:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, close),
 7096:                            ok
 7097:                    end},
 7098: 
 7099:          %% Termination
 7100:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 7101:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7102:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, terminate) of
 7103:                                ok ->
 7104:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 7105:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7106:                                    ERROR
 7107:                            end
 7108:                    end},
 7109: 
 7110:          %% *** We are done ***
 7111:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7112:         ],
 7113: 
 7114:     SecServerSeq =
 7115:         [
 7116:          %% *** Init part ***
 7117:          #{desc => "await start",
 7118:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 7119:                            {Tester, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 7120:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, sock => Sock}}
 7121:                    end},
 7122:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 7123:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7124:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 7125:                            ok
 7126:                    end},
 7127:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 7128:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7129:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 7130:                            ok
 7131:                    end},
 7132: 
 7133:          %% The actual test
 7134:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 7135:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7136:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
 7137:                            
 7138:                    end},
 7139:          #{desc => "receive",
 7140:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv} = State) ->
 7141:                            case Recv(Sock, infinity) of
 7142:                                {error, closed} ->
 7143:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)};
 7144:                                {ok, _} ->
 7145:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
 7146:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7147:                                    ERROR
 7148:                            end
 7149:                    end},
 7150:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv closed)",
 7151:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7152:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_closed),
 7153:                            ok
 7154:                    end},
 7155: 
 7156:          %% Termination
 7157:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 7158:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7159:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 7160:                                ok ->
 7161:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 7162:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7163:                                    ERROR
 7164:                            end
 7165:                    end},
 7166: 
 7167:          %% *** We are done ***
 7168:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7169:         ],
 7170: 
 7171: 
 7172:     TesterSeq =
 7173:         [
 7174:          %% *** Init part ***
 7175:          #{desc => "monitor primary server",
 7176:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7177:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7178:                            ok
 7179:                    end},
 7180:          #{desc => "monitor secondary server 1",
 7181:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7182:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7183:                            ok
 7184:                    end},
 7185:          #{desc => "monitor secondary server 2",
 7186:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7187:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7188:                            ok
 7189:                    end},
 7190:          #{desc => "monitor secondary server 3",
 7191:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7192:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7193:                            ok
 7194:                    end},
 7195: 
 7196:          %% Start the primary server
 7197:          #{desc => "order 'primary server' start",
 7198:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7199:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 7200:                            ok
 7201:                    end},
 7202:          #{desc => "await 'primary server' ready (init)",
 7203:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = State) ->
 7204:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_server, init),
 7205:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
 7206:                    end},
 7207: 
 7208:          %% Start the secondary server 1
 7209:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 1' start",
 7210:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 7211:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
 7212:                            ok
 7213:                    end},
 7214:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 1' ready (init)",
 7215:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7216:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server1, init)
 7217:                    end},
 7218: 
 7219:          %% Start the secondary server 2
 7220:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 2' start",
 7221:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 7222:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
 7223:                            ok
 7224:                    end},
 7225:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 2' ready (init)",
 7226:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7227:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server2, init)
 7228:                    end},
 7229: 
 7230:          %% Start the secondary server 3
 7231:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 3' start",
 7232:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 7233:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
 7234:                            ok
 7235:                    end},
 7236:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 3' ready (init)",
 7237:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7238:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server3, init)
 7239:                    end},
 7240: 
 7241: 
 7242:          %% The actual test
 7243:          %% Make all the seondary servers continue, with an infinite recvfrom
 7244:          %% and then the prim-server with a timed recvfrom.
 7245:          %% After the prim server notifies us (about the timeout) we order it
 7246:          %% to close the socket, which should cause the all the secondary 
 7247:          %% server to return with error-closed.
 7248: 
 7249:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 1' to continue (recv)",
 7250:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7251:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 7252:                            ok
 7253:                    end},
 7254:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 7255:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 2' to continue (recv)",
 7256:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7257:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 7258:                            ok
 7259:                    end},
 7260:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 7261:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 3' to continue (recv)",
 7262:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7263:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 7264:                            ok
 7265:                    end},
 7266:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 7267:          #{desc => "order 'primary server' to continue (recv, with timeout)",
 7268:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7269:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv, ?SECS(5)),
 7270:                            ok
 7271:                    end},
 7272:          #{desc => "await 'primary server' ready (recv, with timeout)",
 7273:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7274:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_server, recv)
 7275:                    end},
 7276:          #{desc => "order 'primary server' to continue (close)",
 7277:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7278:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close),
 7279:                            ok
 7280:                    end},
 7281:          #{desc => "await 'primary server' ready (close)",
 7282:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7283:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_server, close)
 7284:                    end},
 7285:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 1' ready (closed)",
 7286:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7287:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server1, recv_closed)
 7288:                    end},
 7289:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 2' ready (closed)",
 7290:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7291:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server2, recv_closed)
 7292:                    end},
 7293:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 3' ready (closed)",
 7294:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7295:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server3, recv_closed)
 7296:                    end},
 7297: 
 7298:          %% Terminations
 7299:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 3' to terminate",
 7300:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7301:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 7302:                            ok
 7303:                    end},
 7304:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 3' termination",
 7305:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = State) ->
 7306:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 7307:                                ok ->
 7308:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sec_server3, State)};
 7309:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7310:                                    ERROR
 7311:                            end
 7312:                    end},
 7313:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 2' to terminate",
 7314:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7315:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 7316:                            ok
 7317:                    end},
 7318:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 2' termination",
 7319:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = State) ->
 7320:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 7321:                                ok ->
 7322:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sec_server2, State)};
 7323:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7324:                                    ERROR
 7325:                            end
 7326:                    end},
 7327:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 1' to terminate",
 7328:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7329:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 7330:                            ok
 7331:                    end},
 7332:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 1' termination",
 7333:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = State) ->
 7334:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 7335:                                ok ->
 7336:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sec_server1, State)};
 7337:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7338:                                    ERROR
 7339:                            end
 7340:                    end},
 7341:          #{desc => "order 'primary server' to terminate",
 7342:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7343:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 7344:                            ok
 7345:                    end},
 7346:          #{desc => "await 'primary server' termination",
 7347:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = State) ->
 7348:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 7349:                                ok ->
 7350:                                    {ok, maps:remove(prim_server, State)};
 7351:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7352:                                    ERROR
 7353:                            end
 7354:                    end},
 7355: 
 7356: 
 7357:          %% *** We are done ***
 7358:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7359:         ],
 7360:     
 7361: 
 7362:     i("start 'primary server' evaluator"),
 7363:     PrimSrvInitState = InitState,
 7364:     PrimServer = ?SEV_START("prim-server", PrimServerSeq, PrimSrvInitState),
 7365: 
 7366:     i("start 'secondary server 1' evaluator"),
 7367:     SecSrvInitState = #{recv => maps:get(recv, InitState)},
 7368:     SecServer1 = ?SEV_START("sec-server-1", SecServerSeq, SecSrvInitState),
 7369: 
 7370:     i("start 'secondary server 2' evaluator"),
 7371:     SecServer2 = ?SEV_START("sec-server-2", SecServerSeq, SecSrvInitState),
 7372: 
 7373:     i("start 'secondary server 3' evaluator"),
 7374:     SecServer3 = ?SEV_START("sec-server-3", SecServerSeq, SecSrvInitState),
 7375: 
 7376:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 7377:     TesterInitState = #{prim_server => PrimServer#ev.pid,
 7378:                         sec_server1 => SecServer1#ev.pid,
 7379:                         sec_server2 => SecServer2#ev.pid,
 7380:                         sec_server3 => SecServer3#ev.pid},
 7381:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 7382: 
 7383:     i("await evaluator"),
 7384:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([PrimServer, 
 7385:                             SecServer1, SecServer2, SecServer3,
 7386:                             Tester]).
 7387: 
 7388:

 7391: %% This test case is intended to test what happens when a socket is 
 7392: %% locally closed while the process is calling the recvmsg function.
 7393: %% Socket is IPv4.
 7394: 
 7395: sc_lc_recvmsg_response_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 7396:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 7397:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 7398:            fun() ->
 7399:                    is_not_windows(), % recvmsg does not work on Windows
 7400:                    has_support_ipv4()
 7401:            end,
 7402:            fun() ->
 7403:                    Recv      = fun(Sock) -> socket:recvmsg(Sock) end,
 7404:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 7405:                                  protocol => tcp,
 7406:                                  recv     => Recv},
 7407:                    ok = sc_lc_receive_response_tcp(InitState)
 7408:            end).

 7534: %% git the setup anyway.
